title: Object Styles
content:
Using the Object Styles feature of InDesign, is there a way to draw a photo frame with the cutline box already tucked neatly below it? This way, it is one motion of the mouse, not two. I am using CS3.

In other words, it would be a combined graphics-and-text frame

I suppose I can’t do this and will just have make one for the library. Anyone have an answer?

 [‹ Using Text wrap with a Numbered List](http://web.archive.org/web/20071112105631/http:/typophile.com/node/36679 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ligature after a space ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071112105631/http:/typophile.com/node/36612 "Go to next forum topic")
